me.about: I am a research fellow in the [Department of AI and Informatics](https://www.mayo.edu/research/departments-divisions/artificial-intelligence-informatics/overview) of Mayo Clinic, working with [Prof. Hongfang Liu](https://www.mayo.edu/research/faculty/liu-hongfang-ph-d/bio-00055092). I received my Ph.D at the [School of Electronic and Information Engineering](http://eie.xjtu.edu.cn/), [Xi'an Jiaotong University](http://www.xjtu.edu.cn/) supervised by [Prof. Qinghua Zheng](http://qhzheng.gr.xjtu.edu.cn/). I obtained my master degree and bachelor degreen in software engineering from Xi'an Jiaotong University. My main research interest mainly focuses on applying data visualization, visual analytics, and machine learning techniques in real-world clinical problems, such as living systematic review and meta-analysis and clinical natural language processing tasks.
me.institution: Department of AI and Informatics, Mayo Clinic
